text: Madeleine Stowe (born August 17 1958) is an American movie and television series actress. She starred in movies such as Revenge, The Last of the Mohicans, Unlawful Entry, Stakeout and The Two Jakes. She was born in Los Angeles, California. == Filmography == === Movies === Year Title Role Notes 1981 Gangster Wars Ruth Lasker 1987 Stakeout Maria McGuire 1988 Tropical Snow Marina 1989 Worth Winning Veronica Briskow 1990 Revenge Miryea The Two Jakes Lillian Bodine 1991 Closet Land VÃ­tima Filme independente 1992 Unlawful Entry Karen Carr The Last of the Mohicans Cora Munro 1993 Another Stakeout Maria McGuire uncredit Short Cuts Sherri Shepard 1994 China Moon Rachel Munro Blink Emma Brody Bad Girls Cody Zamora 1995 Twelve Monkeys Kathryn Railly 1998 The Proposition Eleanor Barret Playing by Heart Gracie 1999 The General's Daughter Warr.
